alert.note: Alert for Adams; Juneau; Monroe (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 4:13PM CDT until July 23 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Juneau County in central Wisconsin... Southern Adams County in central Wisconsin... Southeastern Monroe County in west central Wisconsin... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 413 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles south of Tomah to 6 miles west of Elroy to near Hillsboro, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Elroy around 425 PM CDT. Wonewoc around 430 PM CDT. New Lisbon around 435 PM CDT. Mauston around 440 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include County Roads B And P, Dells Timberland Campground, County Roads B And K, The Town Of Quincy, Johnson Hill, Lyndon Station and Stand Rock Campground. This includes Interstate 90/94 between mile markers 57 and 86. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
